resources.string: Alegría - the Festival of Joy from the 28th of January to the 1st of February 2013 at\' Dr. K. M. Vasudevan Pillais Campus, New Panvel. Alegría - the Festival of Joy is a multi-institution\' mega festival, created with the goal of providing a platform for students to demonstrate their wonderful and sometimes hidden talent and skill.

The Mahatma Education Society is proof of a vision linked irrevocably to national goals. Born in a\' time when education was deemed service, it set about bringing social and economic change through the\' proactive personal development of every child that came into its fold.

Alegría - The Festival of Joy celebrates the beauty of India with "Indie Ishtyle" as our theme for this year that will bring in\' modern sensibilities to Indian aesthetic traditions.\'We give our participants an opportunity and a centre stage to touch all the chords of this vibrant country in a quirky, kitschy\' style. Alegría - The Festival of Joy aims to bring out the desi in you in an "Indie Ishtyle" fashion.

OUR ADDRESS
 Dr. K. M. Vasudevan Pillai's Campus

 New Panvel - 410 206
 Maharashtra, India.
 TELEPHONE:9004215984

FROM NEW PANVEL RAILWAY STATION
 1. Walk towards Janardhan Bhagat Marg
 2. Turn right
 3. Turn left after Sai Plaza
 4. Turn right and we are on the left side of the road
